sentences.en: At least, this may explain the local school safe education some attenuation.
sentences.cn: 至少, 这可以说明当地学校的安全教育有些弱化.

sentences.en: Atmospheric turbulence and attenuation play an important role in laser's transmission.
sentences.cn: 大气湍流与大气消光会给激光传输带来较大的影响.

sentences.en: Attenuation of light is in the form of absorption.
sentences.cn: 光是以吸收的形式衰减.

sentences.en: Elastic energy attenuation degree and plastic energy change rate were defined.
sentences.cn: 定义弹性能衰减度和塑性能变化率.

sentences.en: Express the factors resulting in the attenuation of acoustic waves.
sentences.cn: 叙述引起音波衰减的因素.

sentences.en: It has a rather high transmission frequency and low attenuation.
sentences.cn: 居有较高的传输频率和较低的衰减.

sentences.en: Note that the polyethylene cables offer much lower attenuation than PVC cables.
sentences.cn: 请注意,聚乙烯电缆比PVC( 聚氯乙烯)电缆具有低得多的损耗.

sentences.en: Requirements of passband ripple, stopband attenuation, and achieve a minimum order.
sentences.cn: 要求通带波纹, 阻带衰减, 并用最小阶数实现.

sentences.en: Slow attenuation property of electromagnetic energy is confirmed by experiments.
sentences.cn: 用实验直接验证了瞬态电磁波的慢衰减特性.

sentences.en: The attenuation distance and transmittance are connected together, they influence each other.
sentences.cn: 衰减距离attenuation) 和能见度(transmittance)是联系在一起的, 并相互影响.

sentences.en: The Color, Multiplier and Attenuation parameters can all be animated over time.
sentences.cn: 颜色, 放大器和减弱器都可以超时绘制.

sentences.en: The point of degradation, due to attenuation or distortion, at which a signal becomes unusable.
sentences.cn: 由于衰减或失真使得信号变得不能使用的那个退化点.

sentences.en: Ultrasonic attenuation capacity of cellular Al alloy foam were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了闭孔泡沫铝合金孔结构参数对其超声衰减性能的影响.

sentences.en: Ultrasonic transmission attenuation characteristic in muscular tissue is discussed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 探讨超声对肌肉组织超声传输特性.

sentences.en: Yet some form of attenuation is mandatory.
sentences.cn: 然而有些衰减形式是必须采用的.

words.tran_cn: [电子] 衰减器；[生化] 弱化子
使减弱；使变细；稀释（attenuate的过去分词）
